Summary: Bright Light WSW sky for weeks
divs: Sighting DetailsI have been observing the bright light rising in the WSW sky for the past few months...it was observable about 7 p.m. at night in late September early October. I've looked up some reactions to this "Venus planet" on Youtube and many people don't believe that it is Venus. I stopped and took some zoomed in photos the beginning of October, but the quality of my cellphone camera is pretty crappy, but judge for yourself on these two pictures that I am uploading on here what you make of it. I am someone who has had many sightings and have reported most all to MUFON so when I see an unusual, unexplainable light that just looks out of place, I try to observe and capture it if possible on photo. Thanks.
